statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, protocol, data_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.10' AND protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, data_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, data_size, timestamp, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00';
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_requests FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY num_requests DESC;
SELECT id, data_size, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY data_size DESC, protocol ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_logs WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT source_ip, count(*) AS num_logs FROM intrusion_attempts GROUP BY source_ip HAVING count(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT destination_ip FROM network_logs WHERE protocol = 'UDP';
SELECT * FROM intrusion_attempts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, packet_size FROM network_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_attempts FROM intrusion_attempts GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY num_attempts DESC;
SELECT source_ip, threat_level FROM intrusion_attempts WHERE threat_level > 7 ORDER BY threat_level DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT protocol FROM network_logs;
SELECT source_ip, MAX(threat_level) AS max_threat FROM intrusion_attempts GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY max_threat DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, message FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_logs > 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, intrusion_type, intrusion_method FROM intrusions WHERE status = 'detected' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, activity_type, severity FROM malicious_activities WHERE severity >= 5 AND activity_type LIKE 'Malware%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, protocol FROM malicious_activities WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, activity_type FROM malicious_activities WHERE activity_type LIKE 'ransomware%';
SELECT timestamp, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE destination_ip LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT source_ip, intrusion_type, status FROM intrusions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS traffic_count FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT MAX(data_transfer) AS max_data_transfer FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT * FROM detected_intrusions WHERE detection_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE data_transfer > 1000 ORDER BY data_transfer DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, data_transfer FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND data_transfer < 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, data_transfer FROM network_traffic_logs as ntl JOIN malicious_activities as ma ON ntl.log_id = ma.log_id WHERE ma.threat_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM intrusion_attempts WHERE attempt_time >= '2022-01-01' AND attempt_time <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY attempt_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, port FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM malicious_activities ORDER BY detected_timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM malicious_activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, port, data_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY data_size DESC;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY log_id ASC;

SELECT ntl.log_id, ma.activity_description, ma.detected_timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs ntl JOIN malicious_activities ma ON ntl.log_id = ma.log_id WHERE ma.detected_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ma.detected_timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;
